MultiLangController - Class in corecode
The central controller that is accessed from the External environment (JAVA) for MultiLang integration
MultiLangController(String, String) - Constructor in MultiLangController

MultiLangReader - Class in corecode
Handles the logic of reading from the source file and then constructing the STRING tags using MarkupBuilder and making it ready for writing to the destination file
MultiLangWriter - Class in corecode
Handles the logic of writing to the Destination file
